overview: Jake Deckard brings you Jock Itch, the first video for sports gear fanatics from his Screaming Eagle XXX video line. The game has been played, and The NYC Fuckers have lost. It's time to hold the team member that threw the game responsible. The price is a good round of ass fucking in the locker room. Bend over, Captain Deckard! You throw the game, you get fucked
title: Jock Itch
